JobFullDesc: JOB DESCRIPTION  JOB TITLE                   : MANAGEMENT TRAINEE  REPORTS TO :           MANAGER/ ASSISTANT MANAGER DIRECT REPORTS      : NONE LOCATION                 : HYDERABAD  JOB PURPOSE (Objective):   Under the direct supervision of the Manager, the Management Trainee is responsible for working on projects alongside global/ local teams or any other assigned processes from time to time and drive business results.   JOB SUMMARY: This role supports the Tax function in managing the Corporate Tax work of Invesco’s North American and EMEA entities. The Management Trainee will be required to prepare, analyse, reconcile, review and submit Tax deliverables in a compliant manner.KEY RESPONSIBILITIES / DUTIES:  Assist the Tax Function in managing the Corporate Income and Non-Income Tax Compliance, Reporting and Accounting processes across multiple countries Assist in timely preparation and eventual filing of various Direct and Indirect tax returns and document retention and electronic archiving of the various Tax deliverables. Maintain full responsibility for timely preparation and submission of tax journal entries Monitor and proactively follow-up on the progress of the activities being completed by teams outside of the GBS structure (Tax and External Providers). Support the development of formal process documentation, work instructions and desktop procedures for the tax process areas being transitioned to GBS and assist in implementing the return preparation process in line with the project transition plan. Update process manuals, checklists and deadline listings. WORK EXPERIENCE / KNOWLEDGE:    Strong research, analytical and creative problem-solving skills required, including a thorough understanding of how to analyze and interpret quantitative and qualitative information  Prior experience in financial services domain is preferred  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills   Must be adept in all Microsoft Office programs, with a special emphasis in Excel and PowerPoint  Exposure to ERP footprint, Data visualization and Automation tools is preferred SKILLS / OTHER PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES REQUIRED:  Self-starter, shows strong self-initiative to meet deliverables and overcome issues.  Reliability, self-motivation, attention to detail  Be resourceful and well – organized.  Able to operate and effectively communicate in a team environment.  Able to take ownership and follow through tasks until completion.  Willingness to develop and enhance processes and productivity  Client management skills are essential  To be able to establish priorities and concentrate on detailed information   Ability to handle time critical situations and meet rigorous deadlines  Able to Challenge Status Quo  Desire to learn new financial instruments, processes, and Investment Strategies and make sure to keep informed of the growth and changes within the industry  Skills in Microsoft Office, MS Access, experience and ability to write and create macros and cohesive documentation. WORKING CONDITIONS: Normally works a regular schedule of hours, however hours may vary depending upon the project or assignment Hours include alternate shift work, evenings and/or weekends COMPETENCY REQUIREMENTS – INVESCO CORE:  Passion for excellence through strong execution  Collaborates and builds trusting relationships  Communicates effectively and respectfully  Promotes innovation and continuous improvement  Thinks ahead and makes fact based decisions  Inspires through performance leadership  Builds effective teams  Fosters organizational talent
